Experience
  • Web Developer Dec 2013 - Spet 2015
    Earnobies India Pvt Ltd

    • As the only developer of the small start-up, worked on the development of a prototype website using elementary concepts of HTML, CSS, PHP and JavaScript. This helped the company secure a Seed-Funding equivalent to around 75,000 US Dollars.
    • Being a start-up, had many other non-technical responsibilities which taught me how to work in a high pressure, low income, but satisfying environment.

  • Front-End Developer 2010 - 2011
    Chachacar Pvt Ltd

    • Was successfully able to represent a used car in (Virtual Reality) VR in websites for ease of buying a vehicle using a JavaScript 3D Library three.js in the self-owned start-up.
